summary: The 'Ethanol for America Act of 2025' mandates the EPA to finalize a proposed rule regarding E15 fuel. This includes requirements for E15 fuel dispenser labeling and ensuring compatibility of underground storage tanks with fuel blends containing up to 15% ethanol. The bill also addresses future fuel storage flexibility, requiring new underground storage tank systems to be compatible with up to 100% ethanol. The act aims to clarify and streamline regulations concerning ethanol-blended fuels.
